directions: Measure 2 cups of granulated sugar into a blender or food processor.
Add 1 tablespoon of cornstarch to the blender or food processor.
Pulse or blend the mixture on high speed for about 1-2 minutes, until the sugar is finely ground and has a powdery consistency.
Stop blending occasionally to scrape down the sides of the blender or food processor.
Transfer the powdered sugar to an airtight container for storage.
Use as desired in recipes or as a topping for baked goods.
